maml:description.maml:para: Gets configured rules and their filters on a Sysmon XML configuration file. config file.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
Get-SysmonConfigOptions -Path .\pc_cofig.xml -Verbose
Hashing : SHA1,IMPHASH Network : Enabled ImageLoading : Enabled Comment : Config for helpdesk PCs.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new Sysmon XML configuration file.
Creates a new Sysmon XML configuration file. Configuration options and a descriptive comment can be given when generating the XML config file.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path to write XML config file.
Specify one or more hash algorithms used for image identification
Enable all NetworkConnect events.
Enable all DrierLoad events.
Enable all ImageLoad events.
Enable all CreateRemoteThread events.
Enable all FileCreateTimeEvents.
Enable all ProcessCreate events
Enable all ProcessTerminate events.
Comment for purpose of the configuration file.
Schema Vesion for the configuration file, default is 3.3.
Check for signature certificate revocation.
Log File Creation events.
Log File Creation events.
Log when a running process opens another process.
Log raw access reads of files.
Log Registry events.
Log NamedPipes connection and creations events.
Path to write XML config file.
Specify one or more hash algorithms used for image identification
Enable all NetworkConnect events.
Enable all DrierLoad events.
Enable all ImageLoad events.
Enable all CreateRemoteThread events.

Enable all ProcessCreate events
Enable all ProcessTerminate events.
Comment for purpose of the configuration file.
Schema Vesion for the configuration file, default is 3.3.
Check for signature certificate revocation.
Log File Creation events.
Log File Creation events.
Log when a running process opens another process.

Log Registry events.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
New-SysmonConfiguration -ConfigFile .\pc_cofig.xml -HashingAlgorithm SHA1,IMPHASH -Network -ImageLoading -Comment "Config for helpdesk PCs." -Verbose
VERBOSE: Enabling hashing algorithms : SHA1,IMPHASH VERBOSE: Enabling network connection logging. VERBOSE: Enabling image loading logging. VERBOSE: Config file created as C:\\pc_cofig.xml

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a configuration file that will log all network connction, image loading and sets a descriptive comment.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a Rule and sets its default action in a Sysmon configuration XML file.

Creates a rules for a specified Event Type and sets the default action for the rule and filters under it. Ir a rule alreade exists it udates the default action taken by a event type rule if one aready present. The default is exclude. This default is set for event type and affects all filters under it.

maml:Description.maml:para: Path to XML config file.
Event type to update.
Rule filter action on a macth of any filter under the rule.
@{Text=}
Path to XML config file.
Event type to update.
Rule filter action on a macth of any filter under the rule.
@{Text=}
Path to XML config file.

Rule filter action on a macth of any filter under the rule.
@{Text=}
